constraints.rule: Must not use any infobox template
At least 5 citations with Cite web templates
No more than 3 heading sections (excluding References)
Must include at least one redirect suggestion in a comment
Must include at least one [[File:Placeholder.png|thumb|caption]] placeholder
Must include a == See also == section with 3+ wikilinked entries
Must include at least one {{Blockquote}} template
All dates must use {{Start date}} template format

style_traps.check: Topic context uses 'pivotal role' — article must NOT use significance inflation (groundbreaking, revolutionary, pivotal, transformative)

Count AI watchlist words (delve, tapestry, multifaceted, landscape, realm, paradigm, robust, leverage, foster, comprehensive, innovative, utilize, facilitate, synergy, holistic) — must be fewer than 3
Article must use natural copulas (is, was, has been) — detect if systematically avoided
Topic is complex — article must use prose paragraphs, not default to bullet lists
Topic could seem promotional — verify neutral encyclopedic tone throughout
Check for weasel phrases (some argue, it is widely believed, many consider, critics say without citation)
Check for peacock terms (legendary, iconic, prestigious, renowned, celebrated, distinguished)
Check for hedge words that avoid commitment (arguably, somewhat, to some extent, in a sense)
Check for vague time references (recently, in recent years, currently) — prefer specific dates
All wikilinks must plausibly resolve — no links to obviously nonexistent articles
Citations must have title, url, and access-date at minimum — no stub citations
Opening paragraph must define the subject, not just describe context
